name: Gecko and Noodle Go Get Ramen
name_original: Gecko and Noodle Go Get Ramen
description:
It's a lovely day in Pastel City, and Gecko is bored. So he goes looking for his friend Noodle! Talk with everyone until the end.

Made in Bitsy, This tiny escapade is a gift for jodediah, created with the collaboration of Mozz and Ducklingsmith, the invaluable help of Sean, and it wouldn't have been made without Ayolland's Borksy.

Art based on the higly recommended CanariPack 1BIT TopDown , with some slight tweaks to make it work in an 8x8 grid.
